presentation.title: Tloaela tlhahlobo ea hau ea mosebetsi o latelang!
presentation.message:
Na ho nka lipotso tsa mosebetsi ho u t≈°osa le ho t≈°oenyeha?
Mohlomong u ntse u ikutloa u sa itokisetsa ho nka lipotso tsa mosebetsi?
Ena ke sesebelisoa se phethahetseng sa ho ithuta tsebo ea hau ea puisano ho ea morao-rao ea lipotso!

presentation.title: Itokisetse mosebetsi oa hau o latelang!
presentation.message: Mosebetsi oa Intellitivideo o sebelisa matla a bohlale ba ho ithabisa ho etsa hore lipuisano tsa litaba tsa 'nete li be le lipotso tse latelang tsa bophelo ba' nete.

presentation.title: Ngoliso ea Premium:
presentation.message: Fumana tlaleho qetellong ea thupelo ka 'ngoe e akaretsa moqoqo ka maikutlo le likeletso tsa hau tsa ho hiroa ka puisano ea mosebetsi oa sebele.

list.title: Hlakola pale?
list.message: Na u na le bonnete ba hore u batla ho hlakola nalane eohle?

entry.title: Tlosa puisano?
entry.message: Na u na le bonnete ba hore u batla ho hlakola puisano ee?

validation.title: Phoso ea netefatso
validation.invalid_fields:
Kenya karolo ea boemo bo nepahetseng ba mosebetsi ho etsa kopo ea tlhahlobo e ncha ea mosebetsi.
Ka tsela e fapaneng
validation.unable_to_validate: Ha e khone ho netefatsa masimo.

color_scheme.name: Sehlooho se lefifi
color_scheme.description:
Khetha Pakeng tsa Leseli le Lefifi.
Ipehele ka boiketsetso ea sesebelisoa lekhetlo la pele u bula sesebelisoa.

language.name: Puo
language.description: Khetha puo e khethiloeng ho bonts'a ts'ebetso le ho bua le AI nakong ea lipuisano.

cooldown.description:
Mofuta oa mahala oa sesebelisoa o u lumella ho nka tlhahlobo e le 'ngoe ka hora.

Haeba u rata ho tlosa mefokolo, tlosa lipapatso, 'me u hlahlobe karabo mabapi le hore na u ka ntlafatsa joang kamora ho ngolisa premium.
cooldown.active:
Emela nako e pholileng nako le nako pele u kenya tlhahlobo e ncha.

Haeba u rata ho tlosa li-coowadown, tlosa tlaleho ea maikutlo le likeletso tsa kamoo ho ka ntlafatsang kamora puisano e ngoe le e ngoe, nahana ka matsoho ho Premium.

review.request:
Haeba u ratile sesebelisoa, ka kopo nahana ka ho tlohela tlhahlobo ea ho re thusa.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Puisano e ncha e teng!
new_interview.message: U na le tlhahlobo e ncha e fumanehang ho nka karolo ea mosebetsi.

subscription.title: Premium
subscription.thanks: Kea leboha ha u ngolisa premium! Re u lakaletsa lehlohonolo le katleho lipuisanong tsohle tsa hau tsa nakong e tlang!

error.subscription: Phoso e lekang ho netefatsa theko ea hau.
error.connection:
Phoso ea Khokahano.

Ha e khone ho hokela lebenkeleng.
error.products: Ha e khone ho hlahloba likhetho tsa sehlahisoa.
error.subscription_options:
Ha e khone ho kenya merero ea peeletso.

Ka kopo, sheba khokahano ea hau ea inthanete, kapa leka hape hamorao.

error.title: Phoso
error.unexpected: Ho na le ntho e fosahetseng ... o ka be o sa bone sena! üò±
error.connection_fix: Lekola khokahano ea hau ea inthanete ebe u leka hape hamorao.

store.short_description: Itloaetse puisano ea hau ea mosebetsi e latelang ea mosebetsi ona oa 'nete
store.full_description:
Na ho nka lipotso tsa mosebetsi ho u t≈°osa le ho t≈°oenyeha?
Mohlomong u ntse u ikutloa u sa itokisetsa ho nka lipotso tsa mosebetsi?
Ena ke sesebelisoa se phethahetseng sa ho ithuta tsebo ea hau ea puisano ho ea morao-rao ea lipotso!

Mosebetsi oa Intelliti o sebelisa matla a bohlale a maiketsetso a ho etsa tlhahlobo ea kelello ea ho nyelisa lintho tse hlokahalang ho etsa hore u be le maikutlo a monate a bophelo le ho u itokisetsa ho amohela puisano ea hau e latelang.

Lipuisano li tsamaisana le boemo ba mosebetsi oo u batlang mosebetsi oa mosebetsi oo u o batlang, 'me o fetole lipotso tse amanang le lipheo tsa hau tsa' nete.

Basebelisi ba Premium le bona ba tla fumana tlaleho qetellong ea puisano ka 'ngoe e akaretsa moqoqo ka maikutlo le likeletso tsa hau tsa ho hiroa ka puisano ea mosebetsi oa sebele.
taglines: Itokisetse mosebetsi oa hau o latelang!
Tloaela tlhahlobo ea hau ea mosebetsi o latelang!
ACE Puisano ea hau ea mosebetsi le Ai!
U tla fumana katleho ea hau ea boikoetliso e letelle mona!
premium_benefits: Fumana litlaleho tse nang le maikutlo le likeletso
Lipuisano tse se nang moeli tse sa lekanyetsoang
Fumana litlaleho ka tsela le likeletso kamora lipuisano

translation.title: Thusa ho fetolela
translation.description: Thusa ho fetolela kopo ena lipuong tse ling.
